title: Okay is it just me or is no one else able to choose their champion on the practice tool?
body: "Practice your favourite champion in this solo Summoner's Rift training gym", then proceeds to automatically pick a champion for me...

replies.body: That's heckin' weird! So without any hands on your mouse or keyboard, your client is locking in a champion for you in the champ select screen of Practice Tool mode?

I was able to figure out what it was. 10 minute earlier I was playing 1v1s with my friend. But the thing is we do special 1v1s where we go on ARAM and do all random champions and can't dodge so no one picks OP champions. Later after we finished I tried the practice tool and it chose it randomly. Yesterday, I went into a custom game and started it with all random, backed out and tried the practice tool again and it chose a random champion for me again. But when I restarted my client it worked properly.
